anya-e0903n:489_0: Santo na te ye na vadanti dhammaṃ;

anya-e0903n:611_5: so tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye saddhaṃ samādiyi, sīlaṃ, sutaṃ, cāgaṃ,

anya-e0903n:652_0: Pucchā – pañcaverabhayasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.

anya-e0903n:656_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgatatā pakāsitā.

anya-e0903n:689_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n:689_3: yo vāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsuāropito,
anya-e0903n:689_4: ayaṃ vā mahāpathavī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.

anya-e0903n:700_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṃ bhikkhave saṃsāro,
anya-e0903n:700_2: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ.
anya-e0903n:700_3: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso imaṃ mahāpathaviṃ kolaṭṭhimattaṃ kolaṭṭhimattaṃ mattikāguḷikaṃ karitvā nikkhipeyya ‘ayaṃ me piyā,
anya-e0903n:700_5: Apariyādinnāva bhikkhave tassa purisassa pitupitaro assu.
anya-e0903n:700_9: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhā saṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ” evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.

anya-e0903n:705_0: Pucchā – tatthāvuso tatiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ assusuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:706_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahuleyeva bhikkhū ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n:706_3: yaṃ vā vo iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ amanāpasampayogā manāpavippayogā kandantānaṃ rodantānaṃ assu passannaṃ paggharitaṃ,
anya-e0903n:706_4: yaṃ vā catūsu mahāsamuddesu udaka”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:708_1: tatthāvuso chaṭṭhaṃ saṃgītaṃ sāsapasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:709_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:709_2: Aññataro bhante bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kīvadīgho nu kho bhante kappo”ti.
anya-e0903n:709_3: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “dīgho kho bhikkhu kappo,
anya-e0903n:709_4: so na sukaro saṅkhātuṃ ettakāni vassāni itivā,
anya-e0903n:709_5: (peyyāla) ettakāni vassasatasahassāni itivāti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:711_2: sammāsambuddhena anamataggasaṃyutte gaṅgāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:712_1: rājagahe bhante aññataraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:713_0: Bahukā nu kho bho gotama kappā abbhatītā atikkantā”ti.
anya-e0903n:713_1: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “bahukā kho brāhmaṇa kappā abbhatītā atikkantā,
anya-e0903n:713_2: te na sukarā saṅkhātuṃ ‘ettakā kappā’ iti vā ‘ettakāni kappasatāni’ iti vā ‘ettakāni kappasahassāni’
anya-e0903n:713_3: itivā ‘ettakāni kappasatasahassāni’ iti vā”ti eva mādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:715_0: Pucchā – puggalasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:716_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṃ bhikkhave saṃsāro,
anya-e0903n:716_2: pubbākoṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ.
anya-e0903n:716_3: Ekapuggalassa bhikkhave kappaṃ sandhāvato saṃsarato siyā evaṃ mahā aṭṭhikaṅkalo aṭṭhipuñjo aṭṭhirāsi,
anya-e0903n:716_6: sambhatañca na vinassetyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:718_0: Pucchā – tatthāvuso duggatasuttañca sukhitasuttañca bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:719_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṃ bhikkhave saṃsāro,
anya-e0903n:719_2: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ.
anya-e0903n:719_4: niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ ‘amhehipi evarūpaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ iminā dīghena addhunā’ti,
anya-e0903n:720_1: “amhehipi paccanubhūtaṃ iminā dīghena addhunā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:722_0: Pucchā – tiṃsamattasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:723_1: rājagahe bhante tiṃsamatte pāveyyake bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṃ bhikkhave saṃsāro,
anya-e0903n:723_2: pubbākoṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ.
anya-e0903n:723_5: yaṃ vā vo iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ sīsacchinnānaṃ lohitaṃ passannaṃ paggharitaṃ,
anya-e0903n:723_6: yaṃ vā catūsu mahāsamuddesu udaka”nti evamādinā bhavagatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:725_0: Pucchā – mātusuttādīni panāvuso chasuttāni bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:726_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṃ bhikkhave saṃsāro,
anya-e0903n:726_2: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ.
anya-e0903n:726_4: yo na mātābhūtapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā.
anya-e0903n:726_9: Yo na dhītābhūtapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:729_0: Pucchā – kassapasaṃyutte panāvuso candūpamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:730_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “candūpamā bhikkhave kulāni upasaṅkamatha apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā.
anya-e0903n:730_2: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso jarudapānaṃ vā olokeyya pabbatavisamaṃ vā nadīviduggaṃ vā apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ.
anya-e0903n:730_3: Evameva kho bhikkhave candūpamā kulāni upasaṅkamatha apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:731_0: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave, kathaṃ rūpā bhikkhu arahati kulāni upasaṅkamituṃ.
anya-e0903n:732_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā parisuddhāparisuddha dhammadesanaṃ dassetvā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādo dinno.
anya-e0903n:733_2: kathaṃ rūpassa bhikkhuno aparisuddhā dhammadesanā hoti,
anya-e0903n:733_3: kathaṃ rūpassa bhikkhuno parisuddhā dhammadesanā hotī”ti evamādinā parisuddhāparisuddhadhammadesanā vitthārato
anya-e0903n:733_4: dassetvā “kassapena vā hi vo bhikkhave ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso,
anya-e0903n:733_5: ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabba”nti.
anya-e0903n:733_6: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavato bhikkhūnaṃ ovādo dinno.
anya-e0903n:734_0: Yo hi koci bhikkhave bhikkhu evaṃcitto paresaṃ dhammaṃ deseti “aho vata me dhammaṃ suṇeyyuṃ,
anya-e0903n:735_0: Svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehi passiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhi–
anya-e0903n:736_0: Kassapena vā hi vo bhikkhave ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso,
anya-e0903n:736_1: ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ–
anya-e0903n:738_2: sammāsambuddhena kassapasaṃyutte catutthaṃ kulūpakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:739_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n:739_2: kathaṃ rūpo bhikkhu arahati kulūpako hotuṃ,
anya-e0903n:739_3: kathaṃ rūpo bhikkhu na arahati kulūpako hotu”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:740_0: Kassapena vā hi vo bhikkhave ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso,
anya-e0903n:740_1: ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0903n:742_0: Pucchā – tatthevāvuso bhagavatā dutiya ovādasuttaṃ kattha kena saddhiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:743_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmatā mahākassapena saddhiṃ “ovada kassapa bhikkhū,
anya-e0903n:743_3: ahaṃ vā kassapa bhikkhū ovadeyyaṃ tvaṃ vā,
anya-e0903n:743_4: ahaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kareyyaṃ tvaṃ vā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:744_0: Yassa kassaci bhante saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu,
anya-e0903n:746_0: Pucchā – tatthevāvuso bhagavatā tatiyaovādasuttaṃ kattha kena saddhiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:747_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmatāyeva mahākassapena saddhiṃ “ovada kassapa bhikkhū.
anya-e0903n:747_3: ahaṃ vā kassapa bhikkhū ovadeyyaṃ tvaṃ vā.
anya-e0903n:747_4: Ahaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ kathaṃ kareyyaṃ tvaṃ vā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:748_0: Dubbacā kho bhante etarahi bhikkhū dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgatā akkhamā appadakkhiṇaggāhino anusāsaniṃ–
anya-e0903n:750_1: tatthevāvuso bhagavatā pariyosānaṃ saddhammappatirūpakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:751_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃyeva mahākassapaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:751_2: Āyasmā bhante mahākassapo bhagavantaṃ etadevoca “ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0903n:751_3: yena pubbe appatarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni ahesuṃ,
anya-e0903n:751_5: Ko pana bhante hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0903n:751_6: yenetarahi bahutarāni ceva sakkhāpadāni appatarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahantī”ti.
anya-e0903n:751_7: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “evañcetaṃ kassapa hoti sattesu hāyamānesu saddhamme antaradhāyamāne bahutarāniceva sikkhāpadāni honti,
anya-e0903n:751_8: appatarāca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahantī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:754_2: sammāsambuddhena lābhasakkāraṃyutte pañcamaṃ saṃgītaṃ mīḷhakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:755_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
anya-e0903n:755_2: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave mīḷhakā gūthādī gūthapūrā puṇṇā gūthassa,
anya-e0903n:755_4: sā tena aññā mīḷhakā atimaññeyya “ahamhi gūthādī gūthapūrā puṇṇā gūthassa,
anya-e0903n:755_5: purato ca myāyaṃ mahāgūthapuñjo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:756_0: Taṃ hi tassa bhikkhave moghapurisassa hoti dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya.
anya-e0903n:758_2: na ca no uppanno lābhasakkārasiloko cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassabhī”ti,
anya-e0903n:760_1: tattho āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakehi saṃgītaṃ ekaputtakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbhaṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:761_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya,
anya-e0903n:761_2: saddhā bhikkhave upāsikā ekaputtakaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ evaṃ sammāāyācamānā āyāceyya tādiso tāta bhavāhi,
anya-e0903n:761_3: yādiso citto ca gahapati hatthako ca āḷavako”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:762_0: Esā bhikkhave tulā etaṃ pamāṇaṃ mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ yadidaṃ citto ca gahapati hatthako ca āḷavako.
anya-e0903n:763_0: Sace kho tvaṃ tāta agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajasi, tādiso tāta bhavāhi, yādisā sāriputtamoggallānā.
anya-e0903n:764_0: Mā ca kho tvaṃ tāta sekhaṃ appattamānasaṃ lābhasakkārasiloko anupāpuṇātu–
anya-e0903n:765_0: Evaṃ dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
anya-e0903n:767_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāyakehi saṃgītaṃ ekadhītusuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:768_1: sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
anya-e0903n:768_2: Saddhā bhikkhave upāsikā ekaṃ dhītaraṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ evaṃ sammā āyācamānā āyāceyya ‘tādisā ayye bhavāhi,
anya-e0903n:768_3: yādisā khujjuttarā ca upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā ca nandamātā’ti.
anya-e0903n:768_4: Esā bhikkhave tulā etaṃ pamāṇaṃ mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ,
anya-e0903n:768_5: yadidaṃ khujjuttarā ca upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā ca nandamātā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:769_0: Sace kho tvaṃ ayye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajasi,
anya-e0903n:769_2: yādisā khemā ca bhikkhunī uppalavaṇṇā ca–
anya-e0903n:772_0: Pucchā – rāhulasaṃyuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:773_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:773_2: Āyasmā bhante rāhulo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu,
anya-e0903n:773_3: yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyya”nti,
anya-e0903n:773_4: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “taṃ kiṃ maññasi rāhula,
anya-e0903n:773_14: No hetaṃ bhante”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:776_1: lakkhaṇasaṃyutte panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakattherehi paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ aṭṭhisuttaṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0903n:776_2: kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:777_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṃ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:777_2: Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavatā sammukhe āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ etadavoca “idhāyasmā mahāmoggallāno
anya-e0903n:777_3: gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi,
anya-e0903n:777_4: ko nu kho āvuso moggallāna hetu,
anya-e0903n:777_6: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno “idhāhaṃ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantiṃ”ti evamādinā ārocesi.
anya-e0903n:777_7: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti,
anya-e0903n:777_9: yatrahi nāma sāvako evarūpaṃ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṃ vā karissatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:778_0: Acchariyaṃ vata bho, abbhutaṃ vata bho;
anya-e0903n:781_2: sammāsambuddhena lakkhaṇasaṃyutte tatiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ piṇḍasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:782_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṃ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:782_2: Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhaggavato sammukhe āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ etadavoca “idhāyasmā mahāmoggallāno
anya-e0903n:782_3: gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi,
anya-e0903n:782_6: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno “idhāhaṃ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ maṃsapiṇḍaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ,
anya-e0903n:782_7: tamenaṃ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
anya-e0903n:782_8: Sā sudaṃ aṭṭassaraṃ karotī”ti evamādinā ārocesi.
anya-e0903n:782_9: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti,
anya-e0903n:782_11: yatrahi nāma sāvako evarūpaṃ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṃ vā karissatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:784_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakehi mahātherehi saṃgītaṃ asilomasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.

anya-e0903n:785_2: Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavato sammukhe āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ etadavoca “ko nu kho āvuso moggallāna hetu,
anya-e0903n:785_4: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallānatthero “idhāhaṃ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ asilomaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ”ti evamādinā ārocesi.

anya-e0903n:791_2: kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitāni.

anya-e0903n:792_2: Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavato sammukhe pubbe vuttanayeneva ārocesi.

anya-e0903n:792_19: Esā bhikkhave sāmaṇerī kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasāmaṇerī ahosī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n:795_1: opammasaṃyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi saṃgītaṃ nakhasikhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:796_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n:796_3: yo cāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito,
anya-e0903n:796_4: yā cāyaṃ mahāpathavī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:797_0: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ.
anya-e0903n:800_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi saṃgītaṃ āṇisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:801_1: sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave dasārahānaṃ ānako nāma mudiṅgo ahosi,
anya-e0903n:801_2: tassa dasārahā ānake ghaṭite aññaṃ āṇiṃ odahiṃsu,
anya-e0903n:801_3: ahu kho so bhikkhave samayo yaṃ ānakassa mudiṅgassa porāṇaṃ pokkharaphalakaṃ antaradhāyi,
anya-e0903n:804_0: Pucchā – bhikkhusaṃyutte āvuso bhagavatā navasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:805_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ navaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:805_2: Aññataro bhante navo bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vihāraṃ pavisitvā apposukko tuṇhībhūto saṅkasāyabhi,
anya-e0903n:805_3: na bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karoti cīvarakārasamaye tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “mā kho tumhe bhikkhave etassa
anya-e0903n:805_4: bhikkhuno ujjhāyitthā eso kho bhikkhave bhikkhu catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhamma sukhavihārānaṃ
anya-e0903n:805_5: nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:806_0: Ahampi kho bhante sakaṃ kiccaṃ karomi,
anya-e0903n:807_0: Eso kho bhikkhave bhikkhu catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī –
anya-e0903n:811_0: Dhāreti antimaṃ dehaṃ, jetvā māraṃ savāhiniṃ–
anya-e0903n:815_2: sammāsambuddhena khandhavaggasaṃyutte paṭhamaṃ nakulapitusuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:816_1: bhaggesu bhante susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye nakulapitaraṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:816_2: Nakulapitā bhante gahapati bhagavantaṃ “ahamasmi bhante jiṇṇo vuḍḍho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto āturakāyo abhikkhaṇātaṅko,
anya-e0903n:816_3: aniccadassāvī kho panāhaṃ bhante bhagavato manobhāvanīyānañca bhikkhūnaṃ,
anya-e0903n:816_9: āturo hāyaṃ gahapati kāyo aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho,
anya-e0903n:816_10: yo hi gahapati imaṃ kāyaṃ pariharanto muhuttampi ārogyaṃ paṭijāneyya,
anya-e0903n:816_12: Tasmātiha te gahapati evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘āturakāyassa me sato cittaṃ anāturaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
anya-e0903n:818_0: Pucchā – tañcāvuso bhagavatā saṃkhittena bhāsitaṃ vitthārena kena kathañca vibhattaṃ.
anya-e0903n:819_1: taṃ kho bhante bhagavatā saṃkhittena desitaṃ “kathañca gahapati āturakāyo ceva hoti āturacitto ca.
anya-e0903n:819_2: Idha gahapati assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto,
anya-e0903n:819_3: sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ,
anya-e0903n:819_7: Tassa “ahaṃ rūpaṃ mama rūpa”nti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino taṃ rūpaṃ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
anya-e0903n:819_8: Tassa rūpavipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā
anya-e0903n:821_1: tattheva āvuso dutiyavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhaka mahātherehi paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ aniccasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:822_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “rūpaṃ bhikkhaveaniccaṃ,
anya-e0903n:822_6: Evaṃ passaṃ bhikkhave sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati,
anya-e0903n:824_0: Pucchā – dukkhaanattasuttāni panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n:825_1: sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “rūpaṃ bhikkhave dukkhaṃ,
anya-e0903n:825_11: Evaṃ passaṃ bhikkhave sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati,
anya-e0903n:825_22: nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātī”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n:827_0: Pucchā – bhārasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:828_1: sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “bhārañca vo bhikkhave desessāmi bhārahārañca bhārādānañca bhāranikkhepanañca,
anya-e0903n:828_7: Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave bhāro”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:829_0: Bhārā have pañcakkhandhā, bhārahāro ca puggalo;
anya-e0903n:831_0: Nikkhipitvā garuṃ bhāraṃ, aññaṃ bhāraṃ anādiya;
anya-e0903n:834_0: Pucchā – na tumhākasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:835_1: sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhu ārabbha “yaṃ bhikkhave natumhākaṃ taṃ pajahatha,
anya-e0903n:835_2: taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāyabhavissatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:837_0: Pucchā – anattalakkhaṇasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:838_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante isipatane migadāye pañcavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha “rūpaṃ bhikkhave anattā,
anya-e0903n:838_4: labbhetha ca rūpe evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu,
anya-e0903n:838_5: evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:840_1: theravagge panāvuso tatiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ yamakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:841_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ yamakattheraṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:841_2: Āyasmato bhante yamakattherassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
anya-e0903n:841_3: yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati,
anya-e0903n:841_5: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “taṃ kiṃ maññasi āvuso yamaka,
anya-e0903n:841_6: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:842_1: kathañcāvuso tattha āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati āyasmato yamakattherassa paṭividdhasaccassa
anya-e0903n:842_2: diṭṭhisampannassa anuyogavattajhāpanavasena paṭipucchitvā uttari dhammadesanaṃ vitthārena desesi.
anya-e0903n:843_5: ‘No hetaṃ āvuso’ti evamādinā bhante āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati āyasmato yamakattherassa anuyogavattajhāpanavasena
anya-e0903n:844_0: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi āvuso yamaka, rūpaṃ, vedanaṃ, saññaṃ, saṅkhāre,
anya-e0903n:846_2: sammāsambuddhena khandhavaggasaṃyutte theravagge pañcamaṃ vakkalisuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:847_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ vakkaliṃ theraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:847_2: Āyasmā bhante vakkalithero ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “cirapaṭikāhaṃ bhante bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamitukāmo,
anya-e0903n:847_3: natthi ca me kāyasmiṃ tāvatikā balamattā,
anya-e0903n:847_14: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:848_0: “Ahaṃ vakkali, kiṃ te iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena” –
anya-e0903n:849_0: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi vakkali, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā” –
anya-e0903n:851_0: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”–
anya-e0903n:854_1: kathañcāvuso punapi bhagavā bhikkhū pesetvā āyasmato vakkalittherassa paggahavacanaṃ ārocāpesi.
anya-e0903n:854_2: Sopi kathaṃ attano pavattiṃ bhagavato paccārocāpesi.
anya-e0903n:855_1: suṇāvuso tvaṃ vakkali bhagavato vacanaṃ dvinnañca devatānaṃ,
anya-e0903n:855_2: imaṃ āvuso rattiṃ dve devatāyo abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ gijjhakūṭaṃ obhāsetvā yena
anya-e0903n:856_2: ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho āvuso ekā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ‘vakkali bhante bhikkhu vimokkhāya cetetī’ti.
anya-e0903n:856_3: Aparā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ‘so hi nūna bhante suvimutto vimuccissatī’ti.
anya-e0903n:856_4: Bhagavā ca taṃ āvuso vakkali evamāha ‘mā bhāyi vakkali,
anya-e0903n:856_8: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā punapi bhikkhū pesetvā āyasmato vakkalittherassa paggahavacanaṃ ārocāpesi.
anya-e0903n:856_9: Sopi bhante āyasmā tenahāvuso mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha “vakkali bhante bhikkhu ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno,
anya-e0903n:856_15: natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃvāti na vicikicchāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavato attano pavattiṃ paccārocāpesi.
anya-e0903n:856_16: So hi bhante āyasmā acirapakkantesu tesu bhikkhūsu satthaṃ āharitvā vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0903n:856_18: Evaṃ kho bhante tassa āyasmato abhisamparāyo ahosi.
anya-e0903n:858_0: Pucchā – assajisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:859_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ assajiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:859_2: Āyasmā bhante assaji ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “pubbe khvāhaṃ bhante gelaññe
anya-e0903n:859_5: Tassa mayhaṃ bhante taṃ samādhiṃ appaṭilabhato evaṃ hoti no cassāhaṃ parihāyāmī”ti.
anya-e0903n:859_6: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “ye te assaji samaṇabrāhmaṇā samādhisārakā samādhisāmaññā,
anya-e0903n:859_7: tesaṃ taṃ samādhiṃ appaṭilabhataṃ evaṃ hoti ‘no cassu mayaṃ parihāyāmā’ti.
anya-e0903n:859_9: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:861_0: Pucchā – khemakasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:862_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante sambahule there bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā khemakattherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:862_2: Sambahulā bhante therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dāsakaṃ pesetvā catukkhattuṃ āyasmantaṃ khemakaṃ ābādhikaṃ
anya-e0903n:862_4: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “pañcime āvuso upādānakkhandhā vuttā bhagavatā.
anya-e0903n:862_7: imesu khvāhaṃ āvuso pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu na kiñci attaṃ vā attaniyaṃ vā samanupassāmī”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā khemakattherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:863_1: kathañcāvuso tattha āyasmā khemako uttari dhammadesanaṃ pavaḍḍhetvā vitthārena therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ desesi.
anya-e0903n:863_2: Kīdiso ca nesaṃ dhammadesakadhammappaṭiggāhakānaṃ dhammadesanāya ānisaṃso adhigato.
anya-e0903n:864_1: catutthe bhante vāre āyasmā khemako “alaṃ āvuso dāsaka kiṃ imāya sandhāvanikāya,
anya-e0903n:864_3: ahameva therānaṃ santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti daṇḍamolubbha āyasmā khemako yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0903n:864_4: upasaṅkamitvā therehi bhikkhūhi pucchito “nakhvāhaṃ āvuso rūpaṃ asmīti vadāmi,
anya-e0903n:864_6: Na khvāhaṃ āvuso vedanaṃ asmīti vadāmi,
anya-e0903n:864_7: napi aññatra vedanā asmīti vadāmī”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmā khemako uttaripi dhammadesanaṃ pavaḍḍhetvā vitthārena desesi.
anya-e0903n:864_8: Imasmiñca pana bhante veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṃ therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsu āyasmatoca khemakassa.
anya-e0903n:864_9: Evaṃ kho bhante tesaṃ therānaṃ dhammadesakadhammappaṭiggāhakānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0903n:866_0: Pucchā – channasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:867_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:867_2: Āyasmā bhante channatthero āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca “ovadatu maṃ āyasmā ānando,
anya-e0903n:867_4: karotu me āyasmā ānando dhammiṃ kathaṃ,
anya-e0903n:867_6: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “sammukhā me taṃ āvuso channa bhagavato sutaṃ,
anya-e0903n:867_8: dvayanissito khvāyaṃ kaccāna loko yebhuyyena atthitañceva natthitañca,

anya-e0903n:990_2: Rājā bhante udeno āyasmantaṃ piṇḍolabhāradvājaṃ etadavoca “ko nu kho bho bhāradvāja hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0903n:990_3: yenime daharā bhikkhū susū kāḷakesā bhadrena yobbanena samannāgatā paṭhamena vayasā anikīḷitāvino kāmesu
anya-e0903n:991_0: Etaṃ mahārāja tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena etha tumhe bhikkhave mātumattīsu mātucittaṃ upaṭṭhapetha.
anya-e0903n:991_2: dhītumattīsu dhītucittaṃ upaṭṭhapethā”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā piṇḍola bhāradvājattherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:993_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi dasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ verahaccānisuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:994_1: kāmaṇḍāyaṃ bhante verahaccānigottaṃ brāhmaṇiṃ ārabbha āyasmatā udāyittherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:994_2: Verahaccānīgottā bhante brāhmaṇī āyasmantaṃ udāyittheraṃ etadavoca “kismiṃ nu kho bhante sati arahanto sukhadukkhaṃ paññapenti,
anya-e0903n:994_3: kismiṃ asati arahanto sukhadukkhaṃ na paññapentī”ti.
anya-e0903n:994_4: Tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “cakkhusmiṃ kho bhagini sati arahanto sukhadukkhaṃ paññapenti,
anya-e0903n:994_5: cakkhusmiṃ asati arahanto sukhadukkhaṃ na paññapentī”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā udāyittherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:997_0: Pucchā – devadahavagge āvuso khaṇasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:998_1: sakkesu bhante devadahe nāma sakyānaṃ nigame sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “lābhā vo bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n:998_3: khaṇo vo paṭiladdho brahmacariyavāsāyā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1001_0: Pucchā – samuddavagge panāvuso tatiyaṃ bāḷisikopamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1002_1: rājagahe bhante jīvakambavane sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “seyyathāpi bhikkhave bāḷisiko āmisagatabaḷisaṃ
anya-e0903n:1002_2: gambhīre udakarahade pakkhipeyyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1004_1: saḷāyatanavaggasaṃyutte samuddavagge panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi saṃgītaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ
anya-e0903n:1004_2: ādittapariyāyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1005_1: sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha “ādittapariyāyaṃ vo bhikkhave dhammapariyāyaṃ desessāmi,
anya-e0903n:1005_4: Varaṃ bhikkhave tattāya ayosalākāya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya cakkhundriyaṃ sampalimaṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0903n:1005_5: natveva cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu anubyañjanaso nimittaggāho”tiādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1008_1: āsīvisavagge āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi catutthaṃ saṃgītaṃ paṭhamadārukkhandhopamasuttaṃ
anya-e0903n:1008_2: bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1009_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “passatha no tumhe bhikkhave amhaṃ mahantaṃ
anya-e0903n:1009_2: dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitā.
anya-e0903n:1011_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā orimatīrādīnaṃ upacāravacanānaṃ attho vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsito.
anya-e0903n:1012_1: orimaṃ tīranti kho bhikkhu channetaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1012_2: Pārimaṃ tīranti kho bhikkhu channetaṃ bāhirānaṃ āyatanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1012_3: Majjhe saṃsīdoti kho bhikkhu nandirāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1012_4: Thale ussādoti kho bhikkhu asmimānassetaṃ adhivacananti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha orimatīrādīnaṃ
anya-e0903n:1013_1: imasmiṃ kho pana āvuso sutte bhagavatā bhāsite visesato kassa kīdiso attho kathañca paṭiladdho.
anya-e0903n:1014_1: imasmiṃ bhante sutte bhagavatā bhāsite visesato nandassa gopālakassa pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca yāva arahattāca visesato attho adhigato.
anya-e0903n:1015_0: Labheyyāhaṃ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1016_0: Tena hi tvaṃ nanda sāmikānaṃ gāvo niyyātehi.
anya-e0903n:1019_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi aṭṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ kiṃsukopamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha
anya-e0903n:1019_2: kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1020_1: sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme aññataraṃ kārakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1020_2: Aññataro bhante kārako bhikkhu cattāro khāṇāsave bhikkhū ñāṇadassanavisuddhaṃ pucchitvā asantuṭṭho tesaṃ
anya-e0903n:1020_4: Upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kittāvatā nu kho bhante bhikkhuno dassanaṃ suvisuddhaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0903n:1020_5: Tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “seyyathāpi bhikkhu purisassa kiṃsuko adiṭṭhapubbo assa,
anya-e0903n:1020_6: so yenaññataro puriso kiṃsukassa dassāvī tenupasaṅkameyyā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1022_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi dasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ chappāṇakopamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1023_2: bhikkhave puriso arugatto pakkagatto saravanaṃ paviseyyā’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1024_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā asaṃvaro vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0903n:1025_2: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā piyarūpe rūpe adhimuccati,
anya-e0903n:1025_6: yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantīti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha asaṃvaro vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0903n:1026_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā saṃvaro vibhajitvā vitthārena desito.
anya-e0903n:1027_2: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā piyarūpe rūpe nādhimuccati,
anya-e0903n:1027_4: evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha saṃvaro vibhajitvā vitthārena desito.
anya-e0903n:1030_2: sammāsambuddhena vedanāsaṃyutte pañcamaṃ daṭṭhabbasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1031_1: sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “tisso imā bhikkhave vedanā.
anya-e0903n:1031_6: adukkhamasukhā vedanā aniccato daṭṭhabbā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1033_0: Yo sukhaṃ dukkhato addasa, dukkhamaddakkhi sallato;
anya-e0903n:1035_0: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu, parijānāti vedanā;
anya-e0903n:1036_0: So vedanā pariññāya, diṭṭhe dhamme anāsavo;
anya-e0903n:1037_0: Kāyassa bhedā dhammaṭṭho, saṅkhyaṃ nopeti vedagū.
anya-e0903n:1039_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ sallasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1040_1: sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “assutavā bhikkhave puthujjano sukhampi vedanaṃ vedayati,
anya-e0903n:1040_4: Sutavā bhikkhave ariyasāvako sukhampi vedanaṃ vedayati,
anya-e0903n:1040_9: kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ sutavato ariyabhāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanenā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1043_1: jambukhādakasaṃyutte āvuso paṭhamaṃ nibbānapañhāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1044_1: magadhesu bhante nālakagāmake jambukhādakaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1044_2: Jambukhādako bhante paribbājako āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca “nibbānaṃ nibbānanti āvuso sāriputta vuccati,
anya-e0903n:1044_4: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yo kho āvuso rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo,
anya-e0903n:1044_5: idaṃ vuccati nibbāna”nti evamādinā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1046_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi tatiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ dhammavādīpañhāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ
anya-e0903n:1046_2: ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1047_1: magadhesuyeva bhante nālakagāme jambukhādakaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1047_2: Jambukhādako bhante paribbājako āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca “ke nu kho āvuso sāriputta loke dhammavādino,
anya-e0903n:1047_5: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “ye kho āvuso rāgappahānāya dhammaṃ desenti,
anya-e0903n:1047_8: Te loke dhammavādino”ti evamādinā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1051_1: tattheva porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhaka mahātherehi pariyosānasuttabhāvena saṃgītaṃ dukkarapañhāsuttaṃ kattha
anya-e0903n:1051_2: kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1052_1: magadhesuyeva nālakagāme jambukhādakaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1052_2: Jambukhādako bhante paribbājako āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca “kiṃ nu kho āvuso sāriputta imasmiṃ dhammavinaye dukkara”nti.
anya-e0903n:1052_3: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “pabbajjā kho āvuso imasmiṃ dhammavinaye dukkarā”ti evamādinā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1055_1: moggallānasaṃyutte āvuso dasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ sakkasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1056_1: devesu bhante tāvatiṃsesu sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ ārabbha “sādhu kho devānaminda buddhasaraṇagamanaṃ hoti,
anya-e0903n:1056_2: buddhasaraṇagamanahetu kho devānaminda evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ
anya-e0903n:1056_3: lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā mahāmoggallānattherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1059_1: cittasaṃyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi aṭṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ nigaṇṭhanāṭaputtasuttaṃ kattha
anya-e0903n:1059_2: kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1060_1: macchikāsaṇḍe bhante nigaṇṭhaṃ nāṭaputtaṃ ārabbha cittena gahapatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1060_2: Nigaṇṭho bhante nāṭaputto cittaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca “saddahasi tvaṃ gahapati samaṇassa gotamassa atthi avitakko avicāro samādhi,
anya-e0903n:1060_4: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “na khvāhaṃ ettha bhante bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmi,
anya-e0903n:1060_6: atthi vitakkavicārānaṃ nirodho”ti evamādinā cittena gahapatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1063_1: vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmi” –
anya-e0903n:1066_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi navamaṃ saṃgītaṃ acelakassapasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1067_1: tattheva bhante macchikāsaṇḍe acelaṃ kassapaṃ ārabbha cittena gahapatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1067_2: Acelo bhante kassapo cittaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca “imehi pana te gahapati tiṃsamattehi vassehi atthi koci
anya-e0903n:1067_4: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “gihinopi siyā bhante ahañhi bhante yāvadeva ākaṅkhāmi,
anya-e0903n:1067_5: vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ
anya-e0903n:1067_6: upasampajja viharāmī”ti evamādinā cittena gahapatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1070_2: sammāsambuddhena gāmaṇisaṃyutte paṭhamaṃ caṇḍasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1071_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante caṇḍaṃ gāmaṇiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1071_2: Caṇḍo bhante gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0903n:1071_3: yena midhekacco caṇḍo caṇḍotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0903n:1071_4: Ko pana bhante hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0903n:1071_5: yena midhekacco sorato soratotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti.
anya-e0903n:1071_6: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “idha gāmaṇi ekaccassa rāgo appahīno hoti,
anya-e0903n:1071_9: so caṇḍotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1073_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi sattamaṃ saṃgītaṃ khettūpamasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1074_1: nāḷandāyaṃ bhante pāvārikambavane asibandhakaputtaṃ gāmaṇiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1074_2: Asibandhakaputto bhante gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “nanu bhante bhagavā sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharatīti.
anya-e0903n:1074_4: Atha kiñcarahi bhante bhagavā ekaccānaṃ sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ deseti,
anya-e0903n:1074_5: ekaccānaṃ no tathā sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ desetī”ti.
anya-e0903n:1074_6: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tena hi gāmaṇi taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi,
anya-e0903n:1074_8: tathā naṃ byākareyyāsī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1076_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhaka mahātherehi aṭṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ saṅkhadhamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha
anya-e0903n:1076_2: kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1077_1: nāḷandāyaṃyeva bhante pāvārikambavane asibandhakaputtaṃ gāmaṇiṃ nigaṇṭhasāvakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1077_2: Bhagavā bhante asibandhakaputtaṃ gāmaṇiṃ nigaṇṭhasāvakaṃ etadavoca “kathaṃ nu kho gāmaṇi nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ desetī”ti.
anya-e0903n:1077_3: Evaṃ kho bhante nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti “yo koci pāṇaṃ atipāteti,
anya-e0903n:1077_7: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yaṃbahulaṃ yaṃbahulañca gāmaṇi viharati,
anya-e0903n:1077_9: evaṃ sante na koci āpāyiko nerayiko bhavissati,
anya-e0903n:1077_10: yathā nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa vacana”nti evaṃ kho bhagavatā saṃkhittena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1079_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā yaṃbahulavāde doso pakāsito.
anya-e0903n:1080_2: yo so puriso pāṇātipātī rattiyā vā divasassa vā samayāsamayaṃ upādāya katamo bahutaro samayo yaṃ vāso pāṇamatipāteti.
anya-e0903n:1080_3: Yaṃ vā so pāṇaṃ nātipātetīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā asibandhakaṃ nigaṇṭhanāṭaputtassa sāvakaṃ
anya-e0903n:1080_4: gāmaṇiṃ pucchitvā pucchitvā yaṃbahulavāde doso pakāsito.
anya-e0903n:1081_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā anekaṃsa vipākakammassa ekaṃ savipākavāde doso pakāsito.
anya-e0903n:1082_1: idha gāmaṇi ekacco satthā evaṃvādī hoti evaṃdiṭṭhi yo koci pāṇamatipāteti,
anya-e0903n:1082_2: sabbo so āpāyiko nerayikoti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā anekaṃsa kammavipākassa ekaṃsavipākavāde doso vitthāretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0903n:1083_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā yathādhammasāsane guṇovibhajitvā pakāsito.
anya-e0903n:1084_1: idha pana gāmaṇi tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaropurisa
anya-e0903n:1084_4: “Pāṇātipātā viramathā”ti cāhāti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha yathādhammasāsane guṇo vitthāretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0903n:1086_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi ekādasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ bhadrakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha
anya-e0903n:1086_2: kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1087_1: mallesu bhante uruvelakappenāma mallānaṃ nigame bhadrakaṃ gāmaṇiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1087_2: Bhadrako bhante gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sādhu me bhante bhagavā dukkhassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desetū”ti.
anya-e0903n:1087_3: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “ahañce te gāmaṇi atītamaddhānaṃ ārabbha dukkhassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca deseyyaṃ ‘evaṃ ahosi atītamaddhāna’nti.
anya-e0903n:1087_4: Tatra te siyā kaṅkhā siyā vimatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1090_0: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi gāmaṇi, atthi uruvelakappe manussā” –
anya-e0903n:1092_2: sammāsambuddhena gāmaṇisaṃyutte dvādasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ rāsiyasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1093_1: mallesu bhante uruvelakappenāma mallānaṃ nigame rāsiyaṃ gāmaṇiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1093_2: Rāsiyo bhante gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadadoca “sutaṃ me bhante ‘samaṇo gotamo sabbaṃ tapaṃ garahati,

anya-e0903n:1093_4: Ye te bhante evamāhaṃsu ‘samaṇo gotamo sabbaṃ tapaṃ garahati,
anya-e0903n:1093_5: sabbaṃ tapassiṃ lūkhajīviṃ ekaṃsena upavadati upakkosatī”ti.
anya-e0903n:1093_9: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ ye te gāmaṇi evamāhaṃsu “samaṇo gotamo sabbaṃ tapaṃ garahati,
anya-e0903n:1093_10: sabbaṃ tapassiṃ lūkhajīviṃ ekaṃsena upavadati upakkosatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1094_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā garahitabbāgarahitabbā kāmabhogino vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsitā.

anya-e0903n:1095_3: Idha gāmaṇi ekacco kāmabhogī adhammena bhoge pariyesati sāhasena,

anya-e0903n:1095_5: na saṃvibhajati na puññāni karotīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā garahitabbāgarahitabbā kāmabhogino vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n:1096_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā garahitabbāgarahitabbā tapassino lūkhajīvino vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n:1097_1: tayo me gāmaṇi tapassino lūkhajīvino santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.

anya-e0903n:1097_8: garahitabbāgarahitabbā tapassino lūkhajīvino vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n:1100_1: abyākatasaṃyutte panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhaka mahātherehi paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ khemāsuttaṃ kattha
anya-e0903n:1100_2: kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1101_1: antarā ca bhante sāvatthiṃ antarā ca sāketaṃ toraṇavatthusmiṃ padese rājānaṃ pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha khemāya bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1101_2: Rājā bhante pasenadi kosalo yena khemā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0903n:1101_4: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho bhante rājā pasenadikosalo khemaṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca “kiṃ nukho ayye hoti tathāgato paraṃmaraṇā”ti.
anya-e0903n:1101_5: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “abyākataṃ kho etaṃ mahārāja bhagavatā hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti evamādinā khemāya bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1101_6: Bhagavatā ca bhante aparena samayena raññā pasenadikosalena puṭṭhena evameva puna bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1102_0: Kiṃ panayye nahoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā.
anya-e0903n:1104_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi navamaṃ saṃgītaṃ kutūhalasālāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha
anya-e0903n:1104_2: kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1105_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante vacchagottaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1105_2: Vacchagotto bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “purimāni bho gotama divasāni purimatarāni sambahulānaṃ
anya-e0903n:1105_3: nānātitthiyānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ kutūhalasālāyaṃ sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ ayamantarakathā
anya-e0903n:1105_5: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “alañhi te vaccha kaṅkhituṃ,
anya-e0903n:1105_7: Kaṅkhanīye ca pana te ṭhāne vicikicchā uppannā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1109_1: mahāvaggasaṃyutte panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi dutiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ upaḍḍhasuttaṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0903n:1109_2: kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1110_1: sakkesu bhante sakkare nāma sakyānaṃ nigame āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1110_2: Āyasmā bhante ānandatthero bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “upaḍḍhamidaṃ bhante brahmacariyaṃ yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā”ti.
anya-e0903n:1110_5: sakalamevidaṃ ānanda brahmacariyaṃ yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1111_0: Mamaṃ hi ānanda kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccanti.
anya-e0903n:1114_1: bojjhaṅgasaṃyutte panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi chaṭṭhaṃ saṃgītaṃ kuṇḍaliyasuttaṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0903n:1114_2: kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1115_1: sākete bhante añjanavane migadāye kuṇḍaliyaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1115_2: Kuṇḍaliyo bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ahamasmi bho gotama ārāmanissayī parisāvacaro,
anya-e0903n:1115_3: tassa mayhaṃ bho gotama pacchābhattaṃ bhuttapātarāsassa ayamācāro hoti ārāmena ārāmaṃ uyyānena uyyānaṃ anucaṅkamāmi anuvicarāmi,
anya-e0903n:1115_4: so tattha passāmi eke samaṇabrāhmaṇe itivādappamokkhānisaṃsañceva kathaṃ kathante upārambhānisaṃsañca,
anya-e0903n:1115_5: bhavaṃ pana gotamo kimānisaṃso viharatī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ avoca.
anya-e0903n:1115_6: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “vijjāvimuttiphalānisaṃso kho kuṇḍaliya tathāgato viharatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1117_2: sammāsambuddhena bojjhaṅgasaṃyutte dutiye gilānavagge paṭhamagilānasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1118_1: rājagahe bhante pippaliguhāyaṃ āyasmantaṃ mahākassapattheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1118_2: Āyasmā bhante mahākassapatthero pippaliguhāyaṃ viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
anya-e0903n:1118_3: Atha kho bhante bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahākassapo tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0903n:1118_5: nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ etadavoca–
anya-e0903n:1118_8: kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti,
anya-e0903n:1118_10: Na me bhante khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ,
anya-e0903n:1118_11: bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti,
anya-e0903n:1118_13: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “sattime kassapa bojjhaṅgā mayā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya
anya-e0903n:1120_1: tattheva āvuso tatiye udāyivagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi dasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ udāyisuttaṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0903n:1120_2: kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1121_1: sumbhesu bhante setakenāma sumbhānaṃ nigame āyasmantaṃ udāyittheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1121_2: Āyasmā bhante udāyitthero bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “acchariyaṃ bhante,
anya-e0903n:1121_4: yāva bahukatañca me bhante bhagavati pemañca gāravo ca hirī ca ottappañcāti evamādikaṃ vacanaṃ avoca.
anya-e0903n:1121_5: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “sādhu sādhu udāyi eso hi te udāyi maggo paṭiladdho.
anya-e0903n:1124_1: satipaṭṭhānasaṃyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhaka mahātherehi dutiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ satisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ kārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1125_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante ambapālivane sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “sato bhikkhave bhikkhu vihareyya sampajāno ayaṃ
anya-e0903n:1125_2: vo amhākaṃ anusāsanī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1127_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi catutthaṃ saṃgītaṃ sālasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1128_1: kosalesu bhante sālāyanāma kesalānaṃ brāhmaṇagāme sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “ye te bhikkhave bhikkhū
anya-e0903n:1128_3: te vo bhikkhave bhikkhū catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvanāya samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1130_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi chaṭṭhaṃ saṃgītaṃ sakuṇagghisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1131_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave sakuṇagghi lāpaṃ sakuṇaṃ sahasā ajjhappattā aggahesi.
anya-e0903n:1131_2: Atha kho bhikkhave lāpo sakuṇo sakuṇagghiyā hariyamāno evaṃ paridevasi mayamevamha alakkhikā,
anya-e0903n:1131_5: sacejja mayaṃ gocare careyyāma sake pettike visaye,
anya-e0903n:1131_6: na myāhaṃ sakuṇagghi alaṃ abhavissa yadidaṃ yuddhāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1133_0: Ko pana te lāpa gocaro sako pettiko visayo.
anya-e0903n:1135_0: Ehi kho dāni me sakuṇagghi, ehi kho dāni me sakuṇagghi,
anya-e0903n:1136_0: (Dāruguḷoviya vinivattitvā tasseva leḍḍussa antare paccupādi. Aṭṭhakathā)
anya-e0903n:1137_0: Evañhi taṃ bhikkhave hoti yo agocare carati paravisaye.
anya-e0903n:1138_0: Tasmātiha bhikkhave mā agocare carittha paravisaye.
anya-e0903n:1139_0: Gocare bhikkhave caratha sake pettike visaye.
anya-e0903n:1140_0: Gocare bhikkhave carataṃ sake pettike visaye na lacchati māro otāraṃ, na lacchati māro ārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1142_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi dasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ bhikkhunupassayasuttaṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0903n:1142_2: kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1143_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1143_2: Āyasmā bhante ānando yāvattako ahosi bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
anya-e0903n:1143_5: yohi koci ānanda bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacitto viharati,
anya-e0903n:1143_6: tassetaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ uḷāraṃ pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ sañjānissatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1145_1: tattheva āvuso dutiye nālandavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi tatiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ cundasuttaṃ
anya-e0903n:1145_2: bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1146_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃyeva ānandattheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1146_2: Āyasmā bhante ānandatthero cundena samaṇuddesena saddhiṃ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
anya-e0903n:1146_4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho bhante āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ayaṃ bhante cundo samaṇuddeso evamāha ‘āyasmā bhante sāriputto parinibbuto,
anya-e0903n:1146_6: Api ca me bhante madhurakajāto viya kāyo,
anya-e0903n:1146_8: dhammāpi maṃ nappaṭibhanti ‘āyasmā sāriputto parinibbuto’ti sutvā”ti.
anya-e0903n:1146_9: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “kiṃ nu kho te ānanda sāriputto sīlakkhandhaṃ vā ādāya parinibbuto,
anya-e0903n:1146_13: vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ vā ādāya parinibbuto”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1148_0: Tasmātihānanda attadīpā viharatha attasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā dhammadīpā dhammasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā.
anya-e0903n:1150_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi pañcamaṃ saṃgītaṃ bāhiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1151_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ bāhiyaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1151_2: Āyasmā bhante bāhiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu,
anya-e0903n:1151_3: yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyya”nti.
anya-e0903n:1151_4: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tasmātiha tvaṃ bāhiya ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu.
anya-e0903n:1151_6: sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ diṭṭhica ujukā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1154_1: tattheva āvuso tatiye sīlaṭṭhitivagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi dutiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ ciraṭṭhitisuttaṃ
anya-e0903n:1154_2: kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1155_1: pāṭaliputte bhante āyasmantaṃ bhaddaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1155_2: Āyasmā bhante bhaddo sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0903n:1155_3: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca “ko nu kho āvuso ānanda hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0903n:1155_4: yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hoti,
anya-e0903n:1155_5: ko panāvuso ānanda hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0903n:1155_6: yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti.
anya-e0903n:1155_7: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “sādhu sādhu āvuso bhadda,
anya-e0903n:1155_8: bhaddako kho te āvuso bhadda ummaṅgo”ti evamādinā āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1157_0: “Catunnaṃ kho āvuso satipaṭṭhānānaṃ abhāvitattā abahulīkatattā tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hotī” –
anya-e0903n:1159_1: tassāvuso bhagavatā arahato sammāsambuddhassa pāvacanasamudayabhūtāya mahāvaggapāḷiyā satipaṭṭhānasaṃyutte
anya-e0903n:1159_2: sīlaṭṭhitivagge navamaṃ sirivaḍḍhasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1160_1: rājagahe bhante sirivaḍḍhaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1160_2: Sirivaḍḍho bhante gahapati ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
anya-e0903n:1160_3: Athakho bhante āyasmā ānando yenasirivaḍḍhassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0903n:1160_5: Nisajja kho āyasmā ānando sirivaḍḍhaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca “kacci te gahapati khamanīyaṃ,
anya-e0903n:1160_7: kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti,
anya-e0903n:1160_11: bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti,
anya-e0903n:1160_13: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tasmātiha te gahapati evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘kāye kāyānupassī viharissāmi ātāpī
anya-e0903n:1160_14: sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassaṃ. Vedanāsu. Citte.
anya-e0903n:1160_15: Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharissāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa’nti.
anya-e0903n:1160_17: Evaṃ kho āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1163_1: iddhipādasaṃyutte āvuso catutthaṃ moggallānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1164_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1164_2: Sambahulā bhante bhikkhū heṭṭhāmigāramātupāsāde viharanti uddhatā unnaḷā capalā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā muṭṭhassatino
anya-e0903n:1164_4: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ te bhikkhū saṃvejetvā “kiṃ nu tumhe bhikkhave saṃviggā
anya-e0903n:1164_5: lomahaṭṭhajātā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1165_0: Acchariyaṃ vata bho, abbhutaṃ vata bho.
anya-e0903n:1168_0: Tumheva kho bhikkhave saṃvejetukāmena moggallānena bhikkhunā pādaṅguṭṭhakena migāramātupāsādo saṅkampito sampakampito sampadhālito.
anya-e0903n:1169_1: katamesaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā moggallāno bhikkhu evaṃ mahiddhiko evaṃ mahānubhāvo.
anya-e0903n:1172_1: anuruddhasaṃyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi dasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ bāḷhaginānasuttaṃ kattha
anya-e0903n:1172_2: kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1173_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā anuruddhattherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1173_2: Sambahulā bhante bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ ābādhikaṃ dukkhitaṃ bāḷhagilānaṃ etadavocuṃ “katamenāyasmato
anya-e0903n:1173_3: anuruddhassa vihārena viharato uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”ti.
anya-e0903n:1173_4: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “catūsu kho me āvuso satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittassa viharato uppannā sārīrikā
anya-e0903n:1173_5: dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”ti evamādinā āyasmatā anuruddhattherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1176_1: ānāpānasaṃyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi sattamaṃ saṃgītaṃ mahākappinasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1177_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “passatha no tumhe bhikkhave etassa bhikkhuno kāyassa iñjitattaṃ
anya-e0903n:1177_2: vā phanditabbaṃ vā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1179_1: tattheva āvuso dutiyavagge paṭhamaṃ icchānaṅgalasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1180_1: icchānaṅgale bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “sace kho bhikkhave aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ
anya-e0903n:1180_2: ‘katame nāvuso vihārena samaṇo gotamo vassāvāsaṃ bahulaṃ vihāsī’ti.
anya-e0903n:1180_3: Evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe bhikkhave tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyātha ānāpānassatisamādhinā
anya-e0903n:1180_4: kho āvuso bhagavā vassāvāsaṃ bahulaṃ vihāsī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1183_1: sotāpattisaṃyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ cakkavattirājasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1184_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “kiñcāpi bhikkhave rājā cakkavattī catunnaṃ dīpānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ
anya-e0903n:1184_2: rajjaṃ kāretvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sahabyataṃ,
anya-e0903n:1184_3: so tattha nandane vane accharāsaṅghaparivuto dibbehi ca pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti so catūhi dhammehi asamannāgato,
anya-e0903n:1184_7: aparimutto apāyaduggativinipātā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1186_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi tatiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ dīghāvuupāsakasuttaṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0903n:1186_2: kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1187_1: rājagahe bhante dīghāvuṃ upāsakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1187_2: Bhagavā bhante dīghāvuṃ upāsakaṃ ābādhikaṃ dukkhitaṃ bāḷhagilānaṃ etadavoca “kacci te dīghāvu khamanīyaṃ,
anya-e0903n:1187_4: kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti,
anya-e0903n:1187_7: na yāpanīyaṃ bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti,
anya-e0903n:1187_9: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tasmātiha te dīghāvu evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato bhavissāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1188_0: Yānimāni bhante bhagavatā cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni desitāni, saṃvijjante te dhammā mayi–
anya-e0903n:1189_0: Tasmātiha tvaṃ dīghāvu imesu catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu patiṭṭhāya cha vijjābhāgiye dhamme uttari bhāveyyāsi–
anya-e0903n:1190_0: Mā tvaṃ tāta dīghāvu evaṃ manasākāsi.
anya-e0903n:1191_0: Iṅgha tvaṃ tāta dīghāvu yadeva te bhagavā āha, tadeva tvaṃ sādhukaṃ manasikarohi.
anya-e0903n:1195_0: Dīghāvu bhikkhave upāsako pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
anya-e0903n:1197_2: sammāsambuddhena sotāpattisaṃyutte sattamaṃ saṃgītaṃ veḷudvāreyyasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1198_1: kosalesu bhante veḷudvāre nāma kosalānaṃ brāhmaṇa gāme veḷudvāreyyake brāhmaṇagahapatike ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1199_0: Veḷudvāreyyakā bhante brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ “mayaṃ bho gotama evaṃkāmā evaṃchandā
anya-e0903n:1199_3: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyyāma,
anya-e0903n:1199_4: tesaṃ no bhavaṃ gotamo amhākaṃ evaṃkāmānaṃ evaṃchandānaṃ evaṃadhippāyānaṃ tathā dammaṃ desetu,
anya-e0903n:1199_6: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyyāmā”ti.
anya-e0903n:1199_7: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “attūpanāyikaṃ vo gahapatayo dhammapariyāyaṃ desessāmi,
anya-e0903n:1202_1: tattheva āvuso tatiye saraṇānivagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ paṭhamamahānāmasuttaṃ
anya-e0903n:1202_2: bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1203_1: sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1203_2: Mahānāmo bhante sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “idaṃ bhante kapilavatthu iddhañceva phītañca bāhujaññaṃ ākiṇṇamanussaṃ sambādhabyūhaṃ,
anya-e0903n:1203_3: so khvāhaṃ bhante bhagavantaṃ vā payirupāsitvā manobhāvanīye vā bhikkhū sāyanhasamayaṃ kapilavatthuṃ pavisanto bhantenapi hatthinā samāgacchāmi,
anya-e0903n:1203_8: tassa mayhaṃ bhante tasmiṃ samaye mussateva bhagavantaṃ ārabbha sati,
anya-e0903n:1203_11: tassa mayhaṃ bhante evaṃ hoti imamhi cāhaṃ samaye kālaṃ kareyyaṃ,
anya-e0903n:1203_16: apāpakaṃ te maraṇaṃ bhavissati apāpikā kālaṃ kiriyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1205_1: tattheva āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi pañcamaṃ saṃgītaṃ dutiyasaraṇānisakkasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha
anya-e0903n:1205_2: kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1206_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme mahānāmaṃyeva sakkaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1207_0: Mahānāmo bhante sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “idha bhante saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato,
anya-e0903n:1207_1: so bhagavatā byākato ‘sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’ti.
anya-e0903n:1207_2: Tatra sudaṃ bhante sambahulā sakkā saṅgamma samāgamma ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti ‘acchariyaṃ vata bho,
anya-e0903n:1208_1: ettha dāni ko na sotāpanno bhavissati,
anya-e0903n:1208_2: yatra hi nāma saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato,
anya-e0903n:1208_3: so bhagavatā byākato ‘sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’ti,
anya-e0903n:1208_4: saraṇāni sakko sikkhāya aparipūrakārī ahosī”ti tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yo so mahānāma dīgharattaṃ upāsako buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato,
anya-e0903n:1208_7: so kathaṃ vinipātaṃ gaccheyyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1210_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi chaṭṭhaṃ saṃgītaṃ paṭhamaanāthapiṇḍikasuttaṃ kattha
anya-e0903n:1210_2: kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1211_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1212_0: Āyasmā bhante sāriputtatthero āyasmatā ānandattherena pacchāsamaṇena saddhiṃ yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0903n:1212_2: nisajja kho āyasmā sāriputto anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ ābādhikaṃ dukkhitaṃ bāḷhagilānaṃ etadavoca “kacci te gahapati khamanīyaṃ kacci yāpanīyaṃ,
anya-e0903n:1212_13: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yathā rūpena kho gahapati buddhe appasādena samannāgato assutavā puthujjano
anya-e0903n:1212_14: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ niyaraṃ upapajjati tathārūpo te buddhe appasādo natthi,
anya-e0903n:1212_15: atthi ca kho te gahapati buddhe aveccappasādo ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho…pe…
anya-e0903n:1212_16: bhagavā’ti tañca pana te buddhe aveccappasādaṃ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyyā”ti
anya-e0903n:1216_0: Adaliddoti taṃ āhu, amoghaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1221_1: tattheva āvuso puññābhisandavaggo porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi sattamaṃ saṃgītaṃ mahānāmasuttaṃ
anya-e0903n:1221_2: bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1222_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1223_0: Mahānāmo bhante sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kittāvatā nu kho bhante upāsako hotī”ti.
anya-e0903n:1223_1: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yato kho mahānāma buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti,
anya-e0903n:1223_3: saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1224_0: Kittāvatā nu kho bhante upāsako hoti.
anya-e0903n:1226_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi navamaṃ saṃgītaṃ kāḷigodhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ kārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1227_1: sakkesu bhante kāḷigodhaṃ nāma sākiyāniṃ ārabbha “catūhi kho godhe dhammehi samannāgatā ariyasāvikā sotāpannā
anya-e0903n:1227_2: hoti avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1228_0: Lābhā te godhe, suladdhaṃ te godhe, sotāpattiphalaṃ tayā godhe –
anya-e0903n:1230_2: sammāsambuddhena sotāpattisaṃyutte puññābhisandavagge dasamaṃ nandiyasakkasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1231_1: sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme nandiyaṃ sakkaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1231_2: Nandiyo bhante sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “yasseva nu kho bhante ariyasāvakassa cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathāsabbaṃ natthi,
anya-e0903n:1231_3: sveva nu kho bhante ariyasāvako pamādavihārī”ti.
anya-e0903n:1231_4: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yassa kho nandiya cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni sabbenasabbaṃ sabbathāsabbaṃ natthi,
anya-e0903n:1231_5: tamahaṃ bāhiro puthujjanapakkhe ṭhitoti vadāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1234_1: saccasaṃyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāyakamahātherehi dasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ tiracchānakathāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1235_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha mā bhikkhave anekavihitaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ katheyyātha.
anya-e0903n:1235_3: rājakathaṃ corakathaṃ mahāmattakathaṃ senākathaṃ bhayakathaṃ yuddhakathaṃ annakathaṃ pānakathaṃ vatthakathaṃ
anya-e0903n:1237_0: Tasmātiha bhikkhave idaṃ dukkhanti yogo karaṇīyo…pe…
anya-e0903n:1239_1: tattheva āvuso dhammacakkappavattanavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ dhammacakkapavattanasuttaṃ
anya-e0903n:1239_2: bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1240_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante isipatane migadāye pañcavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha “dve me bhikkhave antā pabbajitena nasevitabbā.
anya-e0903n:1240_3: yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṃhito,
anya-e0903n:1240_4: yo cāyaṃ attakilamathānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṃhito,
anya-e0903n:1240_5: ete kho bhikkhave ubho ante anupagamma majjhimāpaṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1242_1: tattheva āvuso koṭigāmavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi pañcamaṃ saṃgītaṃ āsavakkhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1243_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “jānatohaṃ bhikkhave passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi,
anya-e0903n:1243_3: Kiñca bhikkhave jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti,
anya-e0903n:1243_4: idaṃ dukkhanti bhikkhave jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti,
anya-e0903n:1243_7: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminīpaṭipadāti jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
anya-e0903n:1243_8: Evaṃ kho bhikkhave jānato evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
anya-e0903n:1243_12: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminīpaṭipadāti yogo karaṇīyo”ti evaṃ kho bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1245_1: tattheva āvuso sīsapāvanavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ sīsapāvanasuttaṃ
anya-e0903n:1245_2: bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1246_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante sīsapāvane sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n:1246_2: katamaṃ nukho bahutaraṃ yāni vā mayā parittāni sīsapāpaṇṇāni pāṇinā gahitāni yadidaṃ upari sīsapāvane”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:1248_1: tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi pariyosānabhāvena saṃgīto pañcagatipeyyālavagge,
anya-e0903n:1248_2: bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsito.
anya-e0903n:1249_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n:1249_3: yo vāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito,
anya-e0903n:1249_4: ayaṃ vā mahāpathavī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsito.
anya-e0903n:1251_0: Vissajjanā – sekkhā ca bhante puthujjanakalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti.
anya-e0903n:1257_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṃ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0903n:1259_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
